text: real brachacheate krob chomnean yeung ban kamnt aoy meanochbab ( knong karkorp sakkar) del puokke chea anak del anouvotd vea . dau che neah chaur komaoy puokke khvengkoumnit nung anak knong kechchakar nih aoy saoh . haey chaur anak ampeavneav( mnoussa lok) towkean mcheasa robsa anak . pitabrakd nasa anak pitchea sthetnow leu meakra da troemotrauv
